pitch.cc: Scott Diamond showed faith in Drew Butera by throwing that curveball in the dirt with a runner on 3rd.
Scott Diamond has Angels batters hitting the ball into the ground so far, getting 4 of his 9 outs on grounders.

pitch.cc: That was pitch number 45 for Dan Haren; his effectiveness may start slipping, as he holds opposing hitters to a .258 average in the first 45 pitches but they hit .308 off him after that.
